title: How to Set the Profile
answer:
A: Incorrect settings of the profile may lead to a dial-up failure. For a customized version, the profile is preset and additional settings are unnecessary. For the general version, you need to add the file manually. Here takes the general version as an example.

**             Step 1      **Check whether the correct profile is set for the Mobile Partner of the data card. If yes, go to Step 2.

**Figure 1-1 **Tools menu

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140923150628470001.gif)

**             Step 2      **Choose **Tools** > **Options** > **Profile Management**. Select **New** to create a profile. Then, set the profile according to the following figure. After the setting is completed, click **Save**. Here takes China Unicom as an example. Consult the local operator for specific settings.

**Figure 1-2 **Profile Management window

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140923150628836002.gif)

**             Step 3      **Click **OK** to close the page. Then, select the profile that is set right now and click **Connect**.

----End
